sentences.sContent: Slavery was abolished in the US in the 19th century.
sentences.sCn: 美国于19世纪废除了奴隶制。

words.tran: 废奴主义者；废除主义者

remMethod.val: a ＋ bol(抛) ＋ ish(使) →使抛弃→ 彻底废除， 废止； 参考： polish(v. 磨光， 擦亮)

trans.tranOther: to officially end a law, system etc, especially one that has existed for a long time
